name: mermaidreader
description: Mermaid图表阅读器 - Go + WebView2 桌面应用

scripts.build-optimized: go build -ldflags="-s -w -H windowsgui" -o bin/MermaidReader.exe main.go && upx bin/MermaidReader.exe
scripts.build-release: go build -ldflags="-s -w -H windowsgui -X main.version="%date:~0,4%%date:~5,2%%date:~8,2%"" -o bin/MermaidReader.exe main.go && upx bin/MermaidReader.exe
scripts.build-all: call build.bat && call build-optimized.bat && call build-full.bat

author: MermaidReader Team
